
Function that computes how often the true value of the parameter is included within the 
95/5 high posterior density interval

### Description

Function that computes how often the true value of the parameter is included within the 
95/5 high posterior density interval



### Usage

<pre><code class='language-R'>id_sim_coverage(obj, rep = 1, quantiles = c(0.95, 0.05))
</code></pre>


### Arguments

<table>
<tr><td style = "white-space: nowrap; font-family: monospace; vertical-align: top"><code id="obj">obj</code></td>
<td>
A fitted <code>idealstan</code> object with true data generated by <code>id_sim_gen</code>
</td></tr>
<tr><td style = "white-space: nowrap; font-family: monospace; vertical-align: top"><code id="rep">rep</code></td>
<td>
How many times the models were fitted on new data, currently can only be 1
</td></tr>
<tr><td style = "white-space: nowrap; font-family: monospace; vertical-align: top"><code id="quantiles">quantiles</code></td>
<td>
What the quantile coverage of the high posterior density interval should be
</td></tr>
</table>
